name: Soloband
description:
Web export delayed the music and the image sync. Play on downloadable standalone export if you want it fixed.

Let's groove! You're in the middle of a concert with your band, while an army of robots is ready to take you down.  Recruit new band members, defend yourself using the power of music, and create the best concert of all times!

In this hybrid action / rhythm game, you play as the leader of a music band, who fights robots using many weapons provided by your recruits. Try to act in rhythm with the music to  empower your shots, and make these evil robots explode!

Instructions:
  • Use W / A / S / D to move.
  • Aim and shoot with your mouse (Left click).
  • Press E or Right click to use your active power once unlocked.
  • Play on the beat to get perfect shots!
  • Destroy the robots to win!
Tips:
  • With the guitar, click (on beat) to shoot fast projectiles.
  • With the piano, click and hold to charge, and release (on beat) to shoot a powerful musicsheet ray.
